snippet.title: Long live the Raptors: Presenting an NBA full of dinosaur mascots
snippet.description:
Long live the Raptors: Presenting an NBA full of dinosaur mascots by Ben Swanson on Jun 25 2013, 12:00p
Why are people so anti-dinosaur? If anything, dinosaurs are much cooler than nearly all pro sports mascots. Here's why we should change all the NBA franchises to species of dinosaurs or other...

snippet.title: Serie A Week 3: Don't Count Your Chickens When The Eggs Are Still Warm
snippet.description:
Serie A Week 3: Don't Count Your Chickens When The Eggs Are Still Warm by Kirsten Schlewitz on Sep 19 2011, 11:26a
We've only just finished week 3 of Serie A 2011-2012, but already many are attaching the word "scudetto" to a few clubs. Rather than point to potential title winners, let's just enjoy the...
